home.like-it: I like to create things with web techonologies

about.title: About me
about.gratitude: Hey there, I'm Nicolas! Thanks for visiting my personal website.
about.who-am-i-content1: I'm a developer from Colombia who is mainly interested in web technologies, especially in backend development.
about.who-am-i-content2: I develop my skills as a self-taught person online platforms (like
about.who-am-i-content4: Youtube). Currenlly I'am studing in the university (UTP) in the colombian government program MisionTic 2022.
about.who-am-i-content5: My curiosity makes me able to learn quickly new tools and technologies when I needed. I enjoy sharing my knowledge and helping others when is possible.
about.tecnologies: These are the technologies that I know and have used in my projects:
